description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任内蒙古自治区政协副主席。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Vice Chairman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 内蒙古自治区下辖的一个旗，是邬宝恒的出生地。
description.en: A banner under the jurisdiction of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region, and the birthplace of Wu Baoheng.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通称中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议内蒙古自治区委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议内蒙古自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在内蒙古自治区的省级地方组织。
description.en: The provincial-level local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的五个自治区之一。
description.en: One of the five autonomous regions of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据Wikitext，邬宝恒是内蒙古杭锦后旗人。
description.en: According to the Wikitext, Wu Baoheng is from Hangjin Rear Banner, Inner Mongolia.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议内蒙古自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 邬宝恒曾担任内蒙古自治区政协副主席。
description.en: Wu Baoheng served as Vice Chairman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类“Category:中国共产党党员”推断，邬宝恒是中国共产党的党员。
description.en: Inferred from the page category 'Category:Communist Party of China members', Wu Baoheng is a member of the Communist Party of China.
